title: Steak and vegetable stir-fry
ingredients: ['100g broccoli florets', '225g sugarsnap peas', '1 red pepper, sliced into strips', '2 carrots, sliced into strips', '3 tablespoons water', '450g sirloin steak, sliced into strips, divided', '2 teaspoons grated fresh ginger, divided', '1 clove garlic, minced, divided', '120ml teriyaki sauce', '1/8 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes, or to taste', '320g hot cooked rice', '2 tablespoons coarsely chopped peanuts (optional)']
